Localization.Name: Carrion Legs Ashen
Localization.Description:
Item Type: Medium Armor
Damage Reduction: 30%
Temp. Rating: -50 / 80 °C
Radiation Protection: 26400 REM
Radiation Scrub Rate: 145.8 REM/s
Carrying Capacity: 4K µSCU

Forged from scavenged metals and ragged clothes, the Carrion armor is a crude concoction of repurposed materials that demonstrates you'll do anything it takes to survive.

The Ashen version is sprayed with white paint and anointed with bone fragments.
